Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: 監視員
Entry.EnglishText: Warden

Entry.JapaneseText: セレーナ
Entry.EnglishText: Selena

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: notice
Entry.EnglishText: Notice

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: 製鉄工場
Entry.EnglishText: Iron Factory

Entry.JapaneseText: 巡回、お疲れ様です。
Entry.EnglishText: Great job on the patrol.

Entry.JapaneseText: ご苦労様です。 異状はありませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: Keep up the good work as well. I trust that there have been no issues?

Entry.JapaneseText: はい、順調に 作業は進んでおります。
Entry.EnglishText: Of course not, the operation is running smoothly.

Entry.JapaneseText: 引き続き、 監視をお願いします。
Entry.EnglishText: Please carry on with the supervision.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>この原版を持っていきますか？ 持っていく やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Take the plate with you? Take it Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>原版を手に入れました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You took the plate.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>ここにあった原版を戻しますか？ 戻す やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Put back the plate? Return it Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>原版を戻しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You put back the plate.

Entry.JapaneseText: 原版は四つまでしか 持つ事ができません。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You can only carry up to four plates.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>ここにあった原版を戻しますか？ 戻す やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Put back the plate? Return it Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>原版を戻しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You put back the plate.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『製鉄用の道具』 製鉄用の道具につき 持ち出し禁止。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Tools for Working Steel - Tools used for steel working are prohibited from being taken outside the workplace.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『製鉄用の原版』 細かい模様が刻まれた 鉄を作るための型。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Steel Plate - A mold for making steel with fine patterns engraved on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>この原版を持っていきますか？ 持っていく やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Take the plate with you? Take it Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>原版を手に入れました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You took the plate.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>ここにあった原版を戻しますか？ 戻す やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Put back the plate? Return it Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>原版を戻しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You put back the plate.

Entry.JapaneseText: 原版は四つまでしか 持つ事ができません。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You can only carry up to four plates.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>ここにあった原版を戻しますか？ 戻す やめる
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140><font:80000002>Put back the plate? Return it Cancel

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green>原版を戻しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green>You put back the plate.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『製鉄用の道具』 製鉄用の道具につき 持ち出し禁止。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Tools for Working Steel - Tools used for steel working are prohibited from being taken outside the workplace.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『製鉄用の原版』 細かい模様が刻まれた 鉄を作るための型。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- Steel Plate - A mold for making steel with fine patterns engraved on it.

Entry.JapaneseText: 最近、溶鉱炉でおかしなことが 起こるんだ…… 気味が悪くてしょうがないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: There's been odd happening around the blast furnace lately... I can't help but feel creeped out.

Entry.JapaneseText: 変わった事があったかだって？ 確かに溶鉱炉で声が聞こえたよ…… あれはきっと人じゃないんだ。
Entry.EnglishText: Have I seen anything unusual? Well I've been hearing strange voices from the blast furnace...and I'm pretty sure they're not coming from a person...

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、そんな…… 人じゃなかったら、何ですか？
Entry.EnglishText: O-Oh... If it's not a person making those noises, then what is it?

Entry.JapaneseText: きっとこの工場に恨みを 持ったヤツの怨念が……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm sure it's the vengeful spirit of someone who holds a grudge against this factory...
Entry.Notes: 怨念 is something like a ghost

Entry.JapaneseText: そ、そんな事、ありえません！ し、失礼します!!
Entry.EnglishText: T-There is no such thing! Sorry, but... I have to go!!
...Huh?

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに溶鉱炉で声が聞こえたよ。 あれはきっと工場に恨みを持った ヤツの怨念なんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty sure I heard voices coming from the blast furnace. It's gotta be from the ghost of someone who holds a grudge against this factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: 確かに溶鉱炉で声が聞こえたよ。 あれはきっと工場に恨みを持った ヤツの怨念なんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm pretty sure I heard voices coming from the blast furnace. It's gotta be from the ghost of someone who holds a grudge against this factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガップラが原版を持ってきて 「鋳型を作って、鉄を入れてくれ」って 頼まれたんだけど……
Entry.EnglishText: Gappler asked me to make a mold out of a negative plate and to pour iron into it.

Entry.JapaneseText: あの形……あそこのくぼみと 似てたんだよね。
Entry.EnglishText: The shape of it resembled that indentation over there.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガップラに頼まれて鉄を入れた鋳型は 溶鉱炉のくぼみと似ていたな……
Entry.EnglishText: The mold that Gappler asked me to put iron into resembled the indentation over by the blast furnace.

Entry.JapaneseText: ガップラに頼まれて鉄を入れた鋳型は 溶鉱炉のくぼみと似ていたな……
Entry.EnglishText: The mold that Gappler asked me to put iron into resembled the indentation over by the blast furnace.

Entry.JapaneseText: その原版で鋳型を作って 鉄を入れてくれって？ ……原版の数が足りないよ。
Entry.EnglishText: You want me to make a mold out of the negative plates and pour iron into it? ...You don't have enough plates.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鋳型が作りたければ、 ちゃんと同じ型の原版を そろえて来てよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you want me to make a mold, you'll need all the plates to be of the same type.

Entry.JapaneseText: その原版で鋳型を作って 鉄を入れてくれって？ ……いいよ。チョット待っててね。
Entry.EnglishText: You want me to make a mold out of a negative plate and to fill it with iron? ...Sure thing, just give me a second.

Entry.JapaneseText: はい。まだ熱いから 気をつけてね。
Entry.EnglishText: Here. It's still hot, so be careful.

Entry.JapaneseText: その原版で鋳型を作れって？ ……君が持ってきた原版は バラバラじゃないか。
Entry.EnglishText: You want me to make a mold out of a negative plate and to fill it with iron? ...The one you have with you is broken.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鋳型が作りたければ、 同じ型の原版をそろえて来てよ。
Entry.EnglishText: If you want me to make the mold, you need to collect plates of the same type.
Entry.Notes: Probably means to say that you need to bring a original version of the mold.

Entry.JapaneseText: 君が持ってきた原版って、 ガップラのと同じだよね？ その形がはやってるの？
Entry.EnglishText: The plate you've brought me is the same one Gappler had, right? That's the shape that you want?

Entry.JapaneseText: 今日も安全第一でがんばろう！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's do our best today! And remember, safety first!

Entry.JapaneseText: この工場に恨みを持ったヤツの怨念が 溶鉱炉に出るようになったんだって、 昨日の夜に仲間から聞いたよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Last night, one of my coworkers said that the blast furnace is haunted by the ghost of someone who holds a grudge against this factory.

Entry.JapaneseText: 今日も安全第一でがんばろう！
Entry.EnglishText: Let's do our best today! And remember, safety first!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140>レバーを倒しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140>You pulled the lever.

Entry.JapaneseText: 柵が閉まっている……
Entry.EnglishText: The grating is shut...

Entry.JapaneseText: 柵が閉まってるよ。
Entry.EnglishText: The grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄柵が閉まっているな。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まってますね。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まっているな。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まっているわ。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まっているわ……
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: 鉄の柵が閉まっている。
Entry.EnglishText: The iron grating is shut.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>レバーがあります。 動かしますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>There is a lever. Pull it? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140>レバーを倒しました。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140>You pulled the lever.

Entry.JapaneseText: <Green><scale:140>レバーが倒れている。
Entry.EnglishText: <Green><scale:140>The lever has been pulled.
